Package com.karangandhi.networking.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Context.OnStartCallback
    This is a callback which will be called when the context starts
    Task.IDLE.Callback
    The callback which will be called when an error occurs while starting the context
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Context
    This is a class that creates a context.
    Debug
    This is a class that helps improving the debugging, adds the class, method name and the line number from where each method is called and where the debug was called.
    ObjectLock
    This is a class that acts as a lock to avoid weird errors happening when many threads access a single object
    Task
    The task that will be added to the context
    Task.IDLE
    Creates a IDLE task that prevents the context from exiting
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TaskNotCompletedException
    Exception that will be thrown when there is a error completing the task
